      Methods in logic with parameters of type QBox 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean QEngine.collision(QBMBox character, QBox wall)
      Checks to see if the objects have already collided.
      static boolean QEngine.collision(QBox wall1, QBox wall2)
      Checks to see if the objects have already collided.
      static boolean QEngine.collision(QMBox character, QBox wall)
      Checks to see if the objects have already collided.
      void QCamera.draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g, QBox box)
      Draws given box with its coordinates shifted, so that it is in accordance with the camera.
      static int QEngine.horizontalCollision(QMBox character, QBox wall)
      Checks to see if character's sides have collision with the given wall object.
      static int QEngine.verticalCollision(QMBox character, QBox wall)
      Checks to see if character's top and bottom have collision with the given wall object.
